sourcesContent:
Inverse Table

Use a class table-inverse inside table element.
@for (item of tableInvoice; track item) { }
Id First Name Last Name Office Position Salary Join Date Age
{{item.id}} {{item.fname}} {{item.lname}} {{item.office}} {{item.position}} ${{item.salary | number : '1.2-2'}} {{item.joindate}} {{item.age}}
